mapper.insert: insert into board_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_board_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update board_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from board_reply where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set replycnt = replycnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
